allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: personal portfolio site

Next.js 14+ with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Three.js \(R3F\),
and Framer Motion. Features interactive 3D hero scene with geometric
wireframe meshes and particle system, smooth scroll animations,
responsive navigation with mobile menu, services grid, project/blog
card components, and contact section. Dark theme with custom brand
colors \(#1A1A2E, #E94560, #0F3460\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
